name: Urinight
description:
First of all I'm so so sorry.

This is a game about aiming the direction of your pee. Many outside factors out of your control are going to deter you, but with enough perseverance, any hole can be filled.

Controls

Grab the man's body with the mouse to adjust angle.

Grab the arrow with the mouse to adjust force.

Press GO! to try out your shot.

Every level's physics are different depending on the variables in the top-left corner: Concentration is how fast the pee falls, Disposition is how far it goes, and Pressure is how dispersed the droplets will be.

You can try as many times as you want, but the Patience meter goes down every second you're not peeing. If it finishes, you lose a life. If all lives are lost, you go back to the first level.

Licenses

All code and graphics are by me, licensed under CC0.

All sounds are taken from freesound.org, all also CC0.
